article_title: Bitcoin Success Hinges on CIOs Embracing Open Platforms, APIs
article_text:
karen bleier/Agence France-Presse/Getty Images

Embracing digital currency such as bitcoin will require CIOs to become comfortable with a more open IT architecture that leverages open source software and APIs, says Bill Dennings, CISO at Bitreserve and former security chief at MasterCard and Nike.
